text: Club Deportivo Orientación Marítima is a Spanish football team based in Arrecife, Lanzarote, in the autonomous community of the Canary Islands. Founded in 1954, it plays in Divisiones Regionales de Fútbol in Canary Islands, holding home games at Ciudad Deportiva de Lanzarote, with a capacity of 7,000 spectators. ==Season to season== {|
